TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Robert_Mugabe, title = Robert_Mugabe, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Mugabe} }

S.FORM: I 1924 a miheca saka 2 folad saka 21 a romi'ad masofoc ci Robert Mugabe, malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Zimbabwa anini i ci Robert Mugabe, patirengan a romi'ad i 1987 a miheca saka 12 folad saka 22 a romi'ad.

I 1924 a miheca saka 2 folad saka 21 a romi'ad masofoc ci Robert Mogabe, malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Zimbabwa anini i ci Robert Mogabe, patirengan a romi'ad i 1987 a miheca saka 12 folad saka 22 a romi'ad.
